231b1(mdo 'grel): na/ cha shas yod pas gcig pa nyid nyams par 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na logs shig na med pas tshigs dang ldan no snyam pa yang med de/ mdzub mo gcig tu 'dod pa dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir/ mdzub mo'i rang gi ngo bo
231b2(mdo 'grel): bzhin du tshigs gsum gcig tu thal bar 'gyur ro/ /mdzub mo yang tshigs gsum dang/ tha mi dad pas tshigs gsum yod pa bzhin du gcig tu 'dod pa yang du mar thal bar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi phyir logs shig na yang med ldan
231b3(mdo 'grel): pa'am 'brel pa'i phyogs kyang med pa de'i phyir/ cha shas med pa'i phyogs ma grub pa med do/ /'on te phyogs gnyis pa ltar na rags pa cha shas dang bcas pa'am tshogs par yod do snyam na de yang mi rigs te/ 'di ltar tshigs
231b4(mdo 'grel): dang po la sogs pa rang gi cha shas las gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa nyid du brjod du med pa'i phyir ma grub pas med do/ /da lta bas na rags pa cha shas dang bcas pa yang yod par yang ma grub po/ /de bzhin du gzugs
231b5(mdo 'grel): la sogs pa dang med pa nyid du khong du chud par bya ste/ de dag gi rang bzhin yang 'dus pa tsam yin pa'i phyir la 'dus pa yang dngos po med pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir ro/ /'o na phyogs gsum pa rdul phra rab kyi mtshan nyid du yod do
231b6(mdo 'grel): snyam pa las/ de yang mi rigs te/ 'di ltar rdul phra rab kyang cha shas tha dad pa'i phyir gcig tu ma grub ste/ rang bzhin 'gal ba dmigs pa'o/ /'o na cha shas tha dad pa de dag yod pas du ma mi srid do snyam pa la/ cha shas med pa'i rdul gcig
231b7(mdo 'grel): ma grub na/ cha shas med pa'i rdul du ma mi 'grub ste/ de ni de bsags pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /de ltar nges pa la shes pa cung zhig 'dzin pa ni rtags rjes su dpag pa'i sgo nas grub pa'o/ /de'i rjes la lus la sogs pa'i rnam pa 'di dag
232a1(mdo 'grel): don dam par gcig dang du ma dang brel ba'i phyir don dam par rang bzhin med do/ /dper na gzugs brnyan bzhin no snyam nas ci la yang dmigs su med do snyam pa'i shes pa skye ba ni rjes su dpag
232a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i shes pa yin no/ /de skad du/ 'phags pa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa las/ ji ltar gzugs brnyan me long snang/ /gcig dang gzhan yang rnam spangs te/ /snang yang de la yod min ltar/ /de bzhin dngos rnams ngo bo
232a3(mdo 'grel): nyid ces gsungs so/ /'o na sems dang sems las byung ba cha shas med pas don dam par yod do snyam pa las/ de ni mi rigs te/ 'di ltar mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa 'di ltar rnam pa du ma dag dang tha mi dad pa'i
232a4(mdo 'grel): phyir/ rnam pa'i rang gi ngo bo bzhin du gcig pa nyid do/ /'o na du mar yod ma pa la/ de yang mi rigs te/ de skad du/ dngos po gang dang gang brtags na/ /de dang de la gcig pa med/ /gang la gcig pa yod min pa/ /de la
232a5(mdo 'grel): du ma 'ang yod ma yin zhes gsungs so/ /de lta bas na yul du snang ba 'di rang bzhin med na sems yod par ga la 'gyur te/ tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro/ /de skad du/ 'phags pa lhas kyang/ yul la bdag med mthong nas ni/ /srid pa'i rtsa ba
232a6(mdo 'grel): sems ldog go zhes gsungs so/ /yang gsungs pa/ tshogs pa rnams la gzhan yod min/ /gzhan ma yin pa'ang yod pa yin/ /de lta ma grub tshig sogs med/ /de phyir tshogs pa tsam du zad/ /tshogs pa dang ni bcas pa yi/ /sor  
232a7(mdo 'grel): mo la sogs rnams kyi ni/ /dngos po thams cad med par bstan/ /tshogs ma gtogs pa'i dngos phra 'ang med/ /de ltar don gcig shes byed pa'i/ /blo ni gang du brtag par bya/ /sems byung tshogs dang bcas sems kyi/ /dmigs pa
232b1(mdo 'grel): gcig 'dir ji ltar 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir/ /don dam par yod do snyam pa yang/ kun rdzob la rigs te/ rang bzhin gyi gtan tshigs yin pa'i phyir ro/ /don dam par yod par sgrub na ni/ /'gal bas
232b2(mdo 'grel): khyab par dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir ro/ /gzhan du na sgyu ma la sogs pa yang don dam par yod par thal bar 'gyur ro/ /de lta bas na 'phags pa klu sgrub kyis/ /ma rig rkyen las byung ba la/ /yang dag shes pa rnam brtags na/ /skye ba dang
232b3(mdo 'grel): ni 'gag pa'ang rung/ /gang yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so/ /gzhan gyi dbang ni yod pa ste/ zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i lung de yang kun rdzob la dgongs nas gsungs pa yin te/ mdo sde nyid las/ blo yis rnam par bzhigs
232b4(mdo 'grel): nas ni/ /gzhan dbang med cing brtags pa'ang med/ /grub pa'i dngos po 'ang yod med na/ /blo yis ji ltar rnam par brtag ces gsungs so/ /chad ci tsam du bsams she na/ rtags sgrub pa dang rjes su dpag pa'i shes pa skyes
232b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i skabs su rtog pa'i don las gzhan du mi 'phro ba/ sems kyi bcad pa'i gnas ma rnyed pas rang gi ngang gi sdod ba zhig 'byung ste/ de tsam du bsam mo/ de skyes pa de'i rjes la 'di snyam du ci la yang mi gnas pa'i sems skye ba zhig
232b6(mdo 'grel): 'dug snyam pa'i bsam pa 'byung ba'o/ /de lta bas na rnam par ma yengs pa'i yid kyis gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa ji skad bshad pa bzhin du dpyad nas chad du phyin pa dang gzhag la re zhig nga la gso'o/ /'di dag gang gis
232b7(mdo 'grel): bsdus pa dang/ /ji ltar snang ba bstan pa dang/ /de la log rtogs sun dbyung dang/ /lus dang brtag dang chad bstan pa'o/ /zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o// //da? ni bsgom pa'i shes
233a1(mdo 'grel): rab skyed pa de rigs te/ 'di snyam du bsam pa'i shes rab gcig dang du ma dang bral ba'i rtags nges par grub cing 'brel pa dran pa'i rjes la dngos po dang dngos po med pa la sogs par sgro 'dogs pa'i
233a2(mdo 'grel): spros pa mdza' dag nges par dpyad pa'i shes pa bstan por skyes kyang sgom pa'i shes rab kyis goms par ma byas na rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes chos thams cad nam mkha' i dkyil lta bur mngon sum du mthong ba'i ye shes skye mi
233a3(mdo 'grel): sred de/ dper na rta dkyus kyis dran nas rgyug pa la med pa ltar byas kyang ma rgyugs na kyus kyi zhabs su phyin pa'i dus med pa lta bu'o snyam du bsam mo/ /de skad du/ 'phags pa sdod po dkod pa las/ dper na mi 'ga' zhig /bang
233a4(mdo 'grel): mdzod mang po 'grang byed kyang/ /nor phyed tsam yang mi thob pa/ /ma bsgoms chos kyang de dang 'dra zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so/ /'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las kyang/ 'di skad du/ dper na mi zhig na
233a5(mdo 'grel): zhing sdug bsngal te/ /lo grangs mang por res 'ga' ma thar ba/ /de ni sdug bsngal nad kyi nyon mongs te/ /na ba 'tsho ba'i ched du sman pa btsal/ /yang dang yang du des ni btsal ba dang/ /sman pa mkhas shing rig pa
233a6(mdo 'grel): des rnyed nas/ /des kyang snying rje nye bar bzhag nas su/ /sman 'di btang bar gyis shig ces byin pa/ /sman mangs phangs pa bzang po de rnyed nas/ /na ba 'tsho bar gyur pa'i sman mi 'thung/ /sman pas mnyes sman gyis mnyes
233a7(mdo 'grel): te/ /nad pa de nyid kyis ni nyes pa yin/ /de bzhin bstan pa 'di la rab byung nas/ /stobs dang bsam gtan dbang po kun rigs nas/ /bsgom pa la ni mngon par brtson mi byed/ /rigs par mi brtson ga la mya ngan 'das zhes
233b1(mdo 'grel): gsungs so/ /de la kha cig na re/ bsgos pa bya ba ni goms par byed pa nyid yin te/ don gzhan ma yin no/ /de lta bas na bsam pa'i shes rab so sor rtog pa dang/ 'byed pa kho na goms pas mi rtog pa'i ye shes skye zhes grag ste/ de ni
233b2(mdo 'grel): mi rigs par tshig gi sil bu'i mdo las/ long pa rkang pas nam byed cing/ /nyam nga'i lam du rgyug byed ltar/ /rjes su dpag pa gtsor 'dzin pa/ /rnam par ltung bar dka' ma yin zhes gsungs so/ /de lta bas na sgom pa'i rim pa dang por
233b3(mdo 'grel): mdzad pa las kyang/ de ltar bsam pa'i shes rab kyis yang dag pa'i don bye brag phyed par byas la de la mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir bsgom pa'i shes rab bskyed do/ /thos pa la sogs pa tsam gyis ni don mngon sum du mi 'gyur
233b4(mdo 'grel): ro zhes 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin la sogs pa las bstan to zhes gsungs te /'phags pa dkon mchog sprin las/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rigs
233b5(mdo 'grel): kyi bu gang dag gis thos pa las byung ba 'am/ bsam pa las byung ba'i shes pas khong du chud par gyur pa de rang gi rigs pa ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma yin te/ thos
233b6(mdo 'grel): ba tsam mam bsam pa tsam gyis ni/ rang gi rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus so/ /rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ dpe nyon cig rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na 'brog dgon pa chen por sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la mi la la
233b7(mdo 'grel): zhig shar phyogs nas nub phyogs su 'gro la de nas mi gzhan zhig nub phyogs nas shar phyogs su 'ong ste/ de yang sos ka tsha bas yongs su gdungs par gyur na skom gyis nyen pa de shar phyogs nas 'ong ba'i mi de la 'di
234a1(mdo 'grel): skad ces smras te/ kye skyes bu sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su gdungs te skom gyis nyen na/ gang na mtsho 'am ltar ka'am rdzing bu gang chu bsil ba dang ba rnyog ma med pa gsal bas gang ba yod de/
234a2(mdo 'grel): gang du bdag tsha ba dang skom pa rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i las bdag la ston cig zer la/ shar phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i mi de yang lam shes pa/ lam la mkhas pa lam mthong ba lam gyi mtshan ma mthong ba zhig yin te/ des
234a3(mdo 'grel): de na chu'i nyes pa dang bral ba'i chu sngon chad mthong la sngon myang zhing sngon yang zhugs pa yin te/ des mi de la 'di skad du/ kye grogs po lam 'di nas lan kha brag mthong gi bar du song la/ kye skyes bu khyod kyis g.yon gyi
234a4(mdo 'grel): lam bor te/ g.yas kyi lam nas nags tshal sngon po dang nags tshal de'i dbus na mtsho 'am lteng kha 'am rdzing bu chu bsil zhing dang brnyog pa med pas gsal bas gang ba mthong gi bar du song la der skyes bu khyod skom pa dang
234a5(mdo 'grel): tsha ba med par byos shig /ces zer na rigs kyi bu de ci snyam du sems sos ka'i tsha bas gdungs te/ skom gyis nyen pa'i mi des chu thos ma thag dang bsam pa tsam gyis tsha ba med par 'gyur ram/ skom pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur bas
234a6(mdo 'grel): chu bsil ba yang rang gi rigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol ba bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das mi de nam der phyin nas des chu der zhugs te 'tshal bar gyur pa de'i tshe mi de'i tsha ba de ma mchis par 'gyur ro/ /
234a7(mdo 'grel): skom pa dang yang bral bar 'gyur ro/ /de bsil ba yang rang gi rigs par 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu thos pa dang bsam pa tsam gyis rang gi rig pa'i chos khong du chud par mi
234b1(mdo 'grel): nus so/ /nga la rigs kyi bu 'brog ces bya ba 'di ni 'khor ba'i 'brog gi tshig bla dags so/ mi sos ka'i tsha bas yongs su gsungs shing skom gyis nyen pa zhes bya ba 'di ni nyon mongs pa'i gdung bas yongs su gdungs shing/ yul gyi sred
234b2(mdo 'grel): pas nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshig bla dags so/ /lam shes pa zhes bya ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la mkhas pa chos myong ba chos rang gis rig pa rnams kyi tshig bla dags so/ /chu gsal zhing
234b3(mdo 'grel): dangs la rnyog pa med pa gsal ba zhes bya ba 'di ni don dam pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dags so/ /yang rigs kyi bu dpe nyon cig rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems gal te de bzhin gshegs pa tshe'i tshad bskal bar bzhugs te
234b4(mdo 'grel): 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi mdun du 'di lta ste/ lha'i bdud rtsi'i dri zhim pa dang gtsang ba dang gya nom pa dang shin tu zhim pa dang reg na bde ba las brtsams te bsngags pa brjod do/ /rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ ci sems
234b5(mdo 'grel): can de dag gis lha'i bdud rtsi'i bsngags pa rang gi rig par 'gyur ram/ /gsol ba bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa 'am bsam pa
234b6(mdo 'grel): tsam gyis rang gi rigs pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus par rig par bya'o/ /rigs kyi bu yang dpe nyon cig rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na mi zhig gis shing tog gi rnam pa sngon sems can sus kyang ma myong ba zhig myangs par
234b7(mdo 'grel): gyur pa des mi gzhan zhig gi mdun du shing tog gi rnam pa de'i bsngags pa 'di lta bu ste/ kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang ro phun sum tshogs pa dang dri zhim pa las brtsams te/ brjod na rigs
235a1(mdo 'grel): kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ ci mi nges shing tog gi ro de rang gis rigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu de lta bas na
235a2(mdo 'grel): khyod kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar thos pa tsam mam bsam pa tsam gyis so sor rang gi rigs pa'i chos khong du chud par mi nus par rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so/ /mi bsgom sngon du mi 'gyur dang/ /de la log par rtog pa dang
235a3(mdo 'grel): de yi sun dbyung bstan pa dang/ /lung gi rgyas par bstan pa yin zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o/ /de la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi yan lag ni/ phung po gsum pa 'am yan lag bdun pa 'am/ chos spyod bcu
235a4(mdo 'grel): 'am chos spyod bcu gsum mam/ chos spyod nyi shu yin te/ bslab pa kun las btus pa las/ de dag na bsod nams kyi phung po yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so/ /de lta bas na gong du smos pa bzhin tshul khrims la sogs pa
235a5(mdo 'grel): zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi tshogs la legs par gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsgom pa'i tshe thob par bya ba ci yod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byas la sgra'i tsher ma med pa yid dang mthun pa'i gnas brag phug gam
235a6(mdo 'grel): rtswa'i spyil pu 'am khang pa la sogs par phyag dar dang/ zhal zhal dang maN+Dal ci nus kyis byas te/ de sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' i sku gzugs ri mor bris pa mdun logs su bkram pa 'am lugs sku mdun logs su
235a7(mdo 'grel): bzhugs la mchod pa'i yo byad 'byor tshad dbul ba khang par go rims bzhin du bshams nas 'di snyam du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lan du mar bdag gi pha dang mar
235b1(mdo 'grel): ma gyur pa'i sems can gcig kyang med do zhes thog ma med pa'i dus kyi mdo las de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs te de lta bas na ji ltar 'jig rten gyi mi sri zhu can pha dang ma la sdang ba'i sems spangs shing khon du 'dzin pa bor nas/
235b2(mdo 'grel): pha dang ma de gnyis bde bar 'dod pa kho na yin pa de bzhin du bdag gis 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas lus ji snyed cig bskyed cing gsos pa'i pha ma 'di dag la sdang pa'i sems la dge ba 'am phan pa'i myu gu mi 'byung bas thab skam po
235b3(mdo 'grel): dang 'dra ba de yud tsam la mi skyed cing khong du 'dzin pa yang spangs nas kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos kyis der nas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du rtag tu bde ba dang phrad par 'dod pa'i rnam pa bsgom par bya'o snyam du bsams
235b4(mdo 'grel): te/ de ni byams pa'o/ /yang ji ltar 'jig rten na mi srid zhu can ni pha ma bde bar 'dod pa'i rnam pa 'byung ba dang mi mthun pa sdug bsngal ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu la gnas pa mthong na de bdag la yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs
235b5(mdo 'grel): par ldan pa'i tshor ba yid mi bde ba dang de'i rkyen gyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i tshor ba sdug bsngal skye zhing bde ba spangs pa de bzhin du rnal 'byor bas kyang pha dang ma 'di thams cad rtag tu bde
235b6(mdo 'grel): par 'dod pa'i rnam pa bskyed pa 'di dang mi mthun pa sdug bsngal dang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu la gnas pas zag pa dang bcas pa'i phung po lnga ni sdug bsngal gyi gong bu yin te/ de skad du 'phags pa dpa' byin gyis zhus pa las/ phung
235b7(mdo 'grel): po lnga grub pa las sdug bsngal gyi gong bu yin no zhes gsungs so/ /de lta bas na sdug bsngal rnam pa gsum gyis ci rigs par sdug bsngal zhing sdug bsngal gyi gong bu 'di dag ji ltar spang snyam du yid kyis shin tu gdungs pa bskyed
236a1(mdo 'grel): do/ /de ni snying rje ste/ des rnal 'byor pa'i bde ba dang yid bde ba spong bas bde sel zhes kyang bya ste/ gzhan sdug bsngal ba spongs nas bde ba spong zhing sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba'i nad skye ba de ni/ snying rje las byung
236a2(mdo 'grel): ba yin te/ de skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa las/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi nad snying rje las byung ba yin no/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de ltar snying rje chen po dung gis bskyed la/ 'gro ba mdza' dag gi sdug bsngal
236a3(mdo 'grel): de gtan spangs nas byang chub kyi snying po la dgod par bya'o/ /snyam du sems bskyed nas/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yid kyis mngon sum du dmigs la 'di skad ces/ phyogs
236a4(mdo 'grel): bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas dang/ /bstan dang don dam bsgrub chos dang/ /'phags dang de rjes slob pa la/ /sgo gsum dang bas phyag 'tshal lo/ /gong du bsham pa'i mchod pa yang skabs der 'bul lo/ /me tog 'bras bu spos kyi shing
236a5(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ /bdug pa'i shing dang rin chen shing rnams sogs/ /nam mkha' mthar thug yongs su ma bzung ba/ /blo yis blangs nas dkon mchog gsum la 'bul/ /byang chub snying por mchis kyi bar/ /sangs rgyas rnams la
236a6(mdo 'grel): skyabs su mchi/ chos dang byang chub sems dpa' yi/ tshogs la 'ang de bzhin skyabs su mchi/ /thog ma med pa'i dus nas bdag gi sems/ /dngos zhen 'dod chags la sogs nyes brgya yis/ /lus ngag gsum bgyis bgyid stsal
236a7(mdo 'grel): rjes yi rang/ /mi bzad gnod sems dkon mchog gsum la bshags/ /chos dang ldan pa'i bya ba'i ched kyi phyir/ /'jig rten gyi ni khams rnams thams cad kyi/ /sangs rgyas dang ni byang chub sems dpa' la/ /rang gi lus ni nges
236b1(mdo 'grel): par 'bul bar gyi/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs bskyed nas/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang/ /byang chub sems dpa' la sogs kyis/ /dge bsags rnams la yi rang ngo/ /bde gshegs byang chub brnyes gyur kyang/ /'khor rnams
236b2(mdo 'grel): dam chos bzung slab du/ /cang mi gsung bar bzhugs rnams la/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /le lo can gyi 'khor rnams 'dul byed du/ /'dus byas mi rtag nges par bstan pa'i phyir/ /mya ngan 'da' ba' i tshul bstan bzhed
236b3(mdo 'grel): rnams la/ /'khor ba ji srid par du bzhugs par gsol/ /ji ltar bder shegs mar me mdzad sogs kyi/ /spyod dang bcas pas byang chub thugs bskyed ltar/ /bdag gi byang chub chen por sems bskyed nas/ /der nas bslab pa
236b4(mdo 'grel): gsum la gnas par bgyi/ /rtog pa thams cad spang slad du/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag sogs bgyis/ /de phyir bdag gi dge bsags 'di/ /bdag la rnam smin 'bras bur ma gyur zhes bsngo bar bya'o// //da ni lus
236b5(mdo 'grel): bcos par bya ste/ khri'am khri'u 'am/ rtswa bting ba 'am/ stan bde ba'i steng du dkyil mo krung bcas te 'dug par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyu lnga yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir te/ lus lags par bsgrims na/ spyod lam de shin tu sbyangs
236b6(mdo 'grel): pa skye par brjes su mthun pa yin pa'i phyir myur ba myur ba kho nar shin tu sbyangs pa skye ba dang/ de bzhin du 'dug pas yun ring du 'da' bar byed nus pa'i spyod lam des de'i lus shin tu ngal bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du
236b7(mdo 'grel): spyod lam da ni gzhan mu stegs pa dang/ phas kyi rgol ba dag dang thun mong ma yin pa dag dang/ spyod lam de 'dug pa gzhan dag gi mthong na shin tu dang ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ de bzhin du spyod lam de ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su snang
237a1(mdo 'grel): zhing bsten pa yin pa'i phyir te/ rgya de lnga yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir skyil mo krung bcas te/ lus drang por bsrang nas dran pa phyogs par bzhag ste 'dug par bya'o/ /lus drang po gang zhe na/ lus
237a2(mdo 'grel): gsal bar bsrang ste bzhag pa dang sems la g.yo ba med cing tshul 'chos pa med par drang? por bzhag pa'o/ /de la lus drang por rab tu zin pas na rmugs pa dang gnyid kyi sems yang dag par blangs te gnas par
237a3(mdo 'grel): mi byed do/ /sems la g.yo ba med cing tshul 'chos pa med pas na phyi rol tu rnam par g.yeng ba yang dag par blangs te gnas par mi byed do/ /de la dran pa phyogs par bzhag ste/ gnas par byed pa gang zhe na/ tshul bzhin
237a4(mdo 'grel): yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i dran pa ni nag po'i phyogs thams cad las phyir phyogs shing mi mthun pa'i phyir dran pa phyogs pa zhes bya'o/ /de nas phrag pa mnyam par bzhag la mgo mi mtho mi dma'
237a5(mdo 'grel): zhing phyogs gcig tu mi g.yo bar bzhag ste/ sna nas lte bar drang por bzhag go /mig ha cang mi dbye ha cang yang mi gzum par sna'i rtse mor gtad cing/ so dang mchu yang tha mal par bzhag go /lce yang ya so'i drung du bzhar
237a6(mdo 'grel): ro/ /dbugs phyir 'byung ba dang nang du rdul ba yang sgra can dang rnam pa can dang/ dbugs rgod bag can du mi btang zhing ci nas kyang mtshor bar de la bu ngal bus lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul du dbugs nang du rdub pa dang/
237a7(mdo 'grel): phyir 'byung ba de ltar bya'o/ /de la mtshams sbyor ba'i shes pa gang zhe na/ dbugs bsnyams ma thag tu 'di snyam du srid pa gsum gyi sems can 'di dag gis chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid ma rtogs shing/ log
237b1(mdo 'grel): par rtogs pa dang/ gom par ma byas pa de bzhin nyid mngon sum du byed pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes sku gsum gyi mchog de ma rtogs so/ /bdag gis ci nas kyang chos nyid de phyin ci ma log par rtag tu yun ring por bsgom
237b2(mdo 'grel): gus par bsgom la ye shes de thob par byas nas gzhan dag gis kyang de kho na nyid mngon sum du byed pa'i ye shes de thob par bya'o/ /snyam du bsam mo/ /de bzhin nyid de gang zhe na/ chos thams cad don dam par yod par yang ma grub med
237b3(mdo 'grel): par yang ma grub po/ /de na gnyis kar yang ma grub/ gnyi ga ma yin pa ci yang med do/ /de skad du/ 'jam dpal gnas pa las de spyod pa spros pa med cing nye bar zhi ste/ yod do zhes kyang khas mi len/ med do zhes kyang khas mi len/ yod kyang
237b4(mdo 'grel): yod la med kyang med do zhes kyang khas mi len/ yod pa yang ma yin med pa yang ma yin zhes de skad kyang khas mi len to zhes gsungs so/ /de bas na bsam pa'i shes rab kyi ci yang ma rnyed do/ /de tsam la gzhan ma yin pa'i don gyis de bzhin
237b5(mdo 'grel): nyid ces sgro brtags nas brjod de/ de bas de bzhin nyid tsam du yang yang dag par ma grub bar dran par bya'o/ /de la sems ji ltar bzhag pa gang zhe na/ de bzhin nyid tsam ma grub par dran nas de ma thag tu sems shes pa shin
237b6(mdo 'grel): tu bsgrims la/ 'di yul gyi chos nyid ces bya ba 'am sems kyi chos nyid ces bya ba 'am/ chos ji bzhin ma zhes bya ba 'am bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings zhes bya ba 'am/ ci yang ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'am don dam pa zhes bya ba
237b7(mdo 'grel): 'am/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa zab mo ston pa'i tshig thams cad kyi rjes su 'brangs nas gzhag par mi bya'o/ /de la nyes pa spangs pa gang zhe na/ mdor bsdu na bzhi ste/ nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa
238a1(mdo 'grel): dang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi mtshan nyid ma shes pa'i nyes pa dang lung du ma bstan ba'i nyes pa dang/ lus dang sems mi bde ba'i nyes pa'o/ /de spang ba ni nyes pa re re'i skabs su bstan to de la nye ba'i
238a2(mdo 'grel): nyon mongs pa ni gsum ste/ rgod pa dang dmigs pa la mi dga' ba dang bying ba'o/ /de la rgod pa'i ngo bo ni dper na rnam par g.yangs pa'i mi lta bu 'am/ spre'u bzhin du sems dmigs pa la mi gnas pa'o/ /des rgyu ni
238a3(mdo 'grel): bzhi ste/ sdug pa'i mtshan nyid yid la byed pas phyi rol gyis lus la chags pa'i 'dun pa yin na/ 'di ltar rnam par bsdos ba dang rnam par rnags pa dang/ rnam par 'bus bzhigs pa dang rnam par bam pa dang rnam par
238a4(mdo 'grel): zos pa dang rnam par dmar ba dang rnam par mthor ba dang/ rus gong ngam keng rus sam/ rus pa'i keng rus yid la byed pas zhi bar bya'o/ /yang na 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las/ gang zhig 'dod chags sems
238a5(mdo 'grel): kyi ni/ /bud med rul pa sten byed pa/ /'gro ba rul par 'gro 'gyur te/ /des na ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur zhes gsungs so/ /de dran pas zhi bar bya'o/ /khong khro ba'i rgyu yis gnod sems skyes nas g.yengs na sems can thams
238a6(mdo 'grel): cad bde bar 'dod pa byams pa bsgoms pa 'am/ gnod sems kyi nyes dmigs dran pas zhi bar byas te/ byams pa seng+ge sgra'i mdo las byang chub sems dpa' la thab 'am ngan sems bskyed pa de tsam gyi bar du
238a7(mdo 'grel): dmyal bar gnas pa go cha bgo dgos zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par rol ba'i mdo las kyang khong khro khong khro zhes bya ba de ni 'jam dpal gang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskal pa rgyan bsags pa 'joms
238b1(mdo 'grel): par byed pa ste/ des bas na khong khro ba zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so/ /'phags pa zla ba'i sgron me'i mdo las kyang/ phan tshun gnod pa'i sems su gang byed pa/ /de la tshul khrims thos bas skyob mi byed/ /bsam gtan dang ni dgon
238b2(mdo 'grel): gnas mi skyo ba ste/ /sbyin dang sangs rgyas mchod pa'ang skyob mi byed ces gsungs so/ /nye du dang/ ljongs dang/ mi 'chi ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang sngon rgod pa dang/ rtses ba dang dga' mgur dpyod pa rjes su dran pa dang/ longs spyod
238b3(mdo 'grel): la chags pas g.yengs na 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal par dran par bya'o/ /yang na 'phags pa rgya cher rol ba las/ srid gsum rga dang nad kyi sdug bsngal 'bar/ /'chi me ra ba 'bar 'di na mgon
238b4(mdo 'grel): med pa/ /srid lam 'byung la 'gro ba rtag tu rmongs/ /bum bar chud pa'i phung ba 'khor ba bzhin/ /rtag tu gzugs sdug mchog dang sgra snyan dang/ /dri zhim ro mchog reg pa bde byed pa/ /dus ngan snying la 'gro ba 'di dag thogs/ /dper
238b5(mdo 'grel): na sngon pa'i snyi la spre'u/ thogs bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pas zhi bar bya'o/ /'gyod pa dang the tshom gyis g.yangs na chos zab mo yid la byas pa sa zhi bar 'gyur ro/ /mi dga' nas g.yengs na yang rgod pa'i phyogs yin pas/ brlan
238b6(mdo 'grel): pa'i thabs gong ma bzhin du bya'o/ /de nas yang shes pa shin tu bsgrims la ci la yang mi gnas par bzhag go/ de la bying ba'i ngo bo nyid ni dmus long dang 'dra ba 'am/ mi mun par zhugs pa 'am/ yig btsum pa dang 'dra bar mi gsal
238b7(mdo 'grel): ba yin te/ de'i rgyu ni ngal dub chen po'i las dang mun pa yid la byas pa dang/ gnyid skyed pa'i kha zas dang btung ba dang tshad khung du 'dug pa dang/ zas skom ha cang mang ba dang ha cang nyung bar zod pa dang 'thungs pa yin te/ de slad pa? ?
239a1(mdo 'grel): des snang ba'i mtshan ma legs par shin tu rab tu bzung zhing lags par yid la byas/ legs par bstan te/ legs par so sor brtags te/ de snang ba dang ldan pa dang 'od dang ldan pa'i sems kyis g.yogs pa
239a2(mdo 'grel): 'am/ bla gab med pa'i 'chags sa na 'chag pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'am/ chos sam dge 'dun nam tshul khrims sam gtong ba 'am lha rjes su dran pa 'am dad bar 'gyur ba'i dmigs pa gang yang
239a3(mdo 'grel): rung bas sems yang dag par bstod yang dag par 'dzin du bcug yang dag par gzengs stod yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa 'am/ phyogs bcu blta ba 'am/ zla ba 'am/ rgyu skar dang gza' dang skar ma dag la lta
239a4(mdo 'grel): ba gtod pa 'am/ chus gdong bkru ba 'am/ mar me 'am/ nor bu'i 'od la bltas pas sangs par 'gyur/ /yang na lhag pa'i bsam pa bskul ba'i mdo las/ gang zhig rmugs dang gnyid la dga' 'gyur ba/ /de ni gti mug
239a5(mdo 'grel): dra ba chen po 'phel/ /de ni lta ba rnyed nas the tshom 'gyur/ /de la lngar 'gyur gzhan yang mang du gyur shes bya ba la sogs pas kha ton byas la bsang ngo?/ /mi dga' nas bying? ste/ 'gro ba yang go rim bzhin du bsal bar bya'o/ /de nas
239a6(mdo 'grel): yang rab tu bsgrims la ci la yang mi gnas par bzhag go/ lung du ma bstan pa'i sems ni gang gi che sems phyi rol du yang mi rgyun pa du yang mi rgyu/ de dge ba la yang mi spyod mi dge ba la yang mi spyod lhag mthong la yang mi spyod
239a7(mdo 'grel): zhi gnas kyang mi 'dzin cing zhum la gnyid kyi non par gnas pa ste/ 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu nyal nyal ba las sang ba'i mig gnyid kyis bsgribs pa'i sems ma gsal ba de bzhin du de'i tshe sems mi gsal bar rgyu
239b1(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /de yang gong du byed pa las/ gsal bar byed pa'i thabs bzhin du byas la/ yang ci la yang mi gnas par bzhag go /de la zhi gnas lhag mthong gi mtshan nyid ma shes pa'i nyes pa ni gang gi tshe dmigs pa la mi dga' nas
239b2(mdo 'grel): byed dam bying du dogs nas gsal bar byas pa 'am/ de? dmigs pa la mi dga' nas g.yengs par mthong nas de la nyes dmigs su ltas nas g.yeng bzhi bar byas pa 'am/ rgod pa'i rgyu gzhan gyi rgod pa 'am rgod du dogs nas zhi
239b3(mdo 'grel): bar byas pa 'am/ lung du ma bstan pa ri sems su shes nas de la gzengs bstod nas gsal bar bzhag pa de'i tshe shes bzhin gyi bltas na/ shes pa shin tu bsal zhing ci la yang mi 'dzin par mthong na bying rgod gnyis las
239b4(mdo 'grel): dben zhing zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel pa yin pas de'i cha ye mi bcos par bzhag go/ de ltar rigs pa las kha cig gi zhi gnas kyi mtshan nyid ni rtse gcig yin pas ci zhig 'dzin dgos su snyam nas dmigs pa tshol
239b5(mdo 'grel): bar byed/ lhag mthong gi mtshan nyid ni yang dag pa la so sor rtog pa yin nam snyam nas rtog par byed pa de ni dper na mi zhig mar me gsal bar byed 'dod pags kyi thams g.yo bar byed na de ni mar me bsod par byed de gsal
239b6(mdo 'grel): bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du gang zag de lo 'bum phrag du ma bsgoms kyang zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi zung du 'brel ba'i yang mi 'thob pa po/ /de bas na mnyam par bzhag pa'i lhag mthong gi mtshan nyid ni rtogs pa com du zad la/
239b7(mdo 'grel): de? dang? ?/ 'brel pa'i bzhi gnas ni de las mi g.yo ba tsam du zad pas de gnyis skad cig ma gcig la tshad bas rang de la bzhag/ gang gi tshe cung zhig lon nas shes pa ni ci zhig la 'dzin pa snyam byed pa'am bag thib pa snyam
240a1(mdo 'grel): byed pa 'am/ gting? du 'gro ba'am song ba snyam byed pa 'am/ nyam chung ba snyam byed na zhi gnas kyi shas che la lhag mthong gi shas chung ba yin pas de'i tshe stobs bskyed la sngar chos thams cad kyi chos nyid ji ltar rtogs
240a2(mdo 'grel): pa de yang dang yang du dran par byas la nam nges pa skyes shing gsal bar gyur ma thag tu dang de la bzhag go/ de ltar byas pas nges pa ma skyes srid na rtags gang yang rung ba'i rjes su 'brangs nas bsam pa'i shes rab bskyed la nam
240a3(mdo 'grel): des ma thag tu dang de la bzhag go/ de la dub pa'i nyes pa ni gnyis te/ lus dub pa dang sems dub pa'o/ /de la ha cang bsgoms drags pa'am/ rkyen gzhan gyis kyang rung ste/ lus dang sems mi bde na spyod lam bag cig bsgyur la? dmigs
240a4(mdo 'grel): pa btang nas 'di snyam du sems can thams cad kun rdzob tu me long gi nang gi gzugs brnyan bzhin du blta'o/ /don dam sbal ba'i spu'i gos dang 'dra'o snyam du bsam mo/ /de skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas
240a5(mdo 'grel): bstan pa las kyang/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can la ji ltar blta bar bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ dri ma med par grags pas smras pa/ me long gi nang gi gzugs bzhin du blta'o/ /sprul? pa'i
240a6(mdo 'grel): rgyab kyi spu'i gos bzhin du blta'o zhes gsungs so/ /de ltar bsam nas ngal bsos pa dang/ spyod lam sngar 'dug pa bzhin du byas la shes pa ci la yang mi gnas par bzhag go/ mdor na bying na ni/ gsal bar bya rgod na brlan
240a7(mdo 'grel): par bya mnyam par zhugs na btang snyoms su bya zhi gnas kyi shas che na rtogs pa'i don dran par bya des des ba ma skyes na rtags kyi rjes su 'brangs nas nam nges pa sgyes ma thag tu dang de la bzhag go/ /nges pa skyes kyang 'byung? na
240b1(mdo 'grel): lhag mthong shas che bas sems mi sbyar la bzhag pa bzhin du g.yo bar 'gyur bas de'i che bags kyis glong la bzhag go/ ngang de la shes pa shin tu gsal la ci la yang ni 'dzin par gnas na nus pa'i tshad dang sbyar la bsgom mo/ /de la
240b2(mdo 'grel): ldang ba'i sems gang zhe na rnam pa gnyis te shes rab kyi sems kyis ldang ba dang thab kyi sems kyi ldang ba'o/ /de la shes rab kyi sems kyis ldang ba ni ting nge 'dzin las ldang bar 'dod na langs la spyod lam ma zhig par 'di snyam
240b3(mdo 'grel): du chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma skyes pa nam mkha' lta bu yin snyam du bsam mo/ /de nas yang kun rdzob tu snang bar bsam mo/ /de skad du 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las/ ji ltar bar snang cung zad sprin med las/ /skad cig tu
240b4(mdo 'grel): sprin gyi dkyil 'khor snang/ /thog ma gang las byung ba shes par bya/ /de bzhin chos rnams thams cad shes par gyis zhes gsungs so/ /de la thabs kyi bsam pas ldang ba ni de ltar don dam par thams cad gzod ma nas ma skyes
240b5(mdo 'grel): kyang/ kun rdzob tu sems nyid sna tshogs su snang ste/ sems can gyi 'jig rten du bsdus pa'i gzugs rnams ni sgyu mas byas pa'i glang po che la sogs pa lta bu'o/ /snod kyi 'jig rten du bsbubs? pa rnams ni smig rgyu la chur snang ba lta
240b6(mdo 'grel): bu'o/ /yul dang longs spyod kyi ngo bo rnams ni rmi lam lta bu'o/ /lus kyi phas kyi ngo bo nyid ni mig yor lta bu'o/ /ngag gis las kyi ngo bo nyid ni brag ca lta bu'o/ /'dod pa na spyod pa'i sems can rnams ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'o/ /gzugs
240b7(mdo 'grel): dang gzugs med ba na de byed pa'i sems can rnams ni chu zla lta bu'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la sogs pa dag ni sprul pa lta bu'o/ /de bas na sgyu ma lta bu'i sems can 'di dag don dam par ngo bo nyid med pa'i chos 'di
241a1(mdo 'grel): dag la yod pa la sogs par blo phyin ci log tu gyur nas nyon mongs pa'i rkyen gyis las sna tshogs bsags pas yun ring por 'khor ba na 'khyam zhing sdug bsngal lo/ /bdag gi ci nas kyang sgyu ma
241a2(mdo 'grel): mkhan bzhin du phyin ci ma log pa'i blos bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa bsags la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byas nas 'gro ba mdza' dag gis byang chub chen po thob par bya'o
241a3(mdo 'grel): snyam du bsams la/ thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad ces phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas sras dang bcas la gus par phyag 'tshal sgrub pas mchod/ de dag spyan sngar sdig pa 'chags shing bsod nams kun la yi rang ngo/ /byang
241a4(mdo 'grel): chub snying por zhugs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul/ /mya ngan 'da' bar bzhed pa rnams la bskal pa dpag tu med pa bzhugs par gsol/ /dge ba 'di yis 'gro ba ma lus kun/ /dngos por 'dzin
241a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i gdon/ spangs gcer ldan zhing/ /rnam mi rtog dang yongs su smin byas nas/ /byang chub chen po kho na myur thob shog /ces smon lam btab nas ldang ngo// //de langs pa'i spyod pa gang zhe na/ gnas skabs thams cad du byang
241a6(mdo 'grel): chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral bar bya ste/ de yang las dang po pa rnams kyis byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'brel ba na byang chub kyi rgyu la dgos so/ /zhes bslab pa kun las btus las gsungs so/ /de ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje chen
241a7(mdo 'grel): po'i snying po can gyis spyin pa la sogs pa'i bya ba rnams yin te/ de skad du/ 'phags pa chos thams cad yang dag par bsdus pa las kyang bka' stsal te yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mthong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 
241b1(mdo 'grel): sems can rnams la snying rje chen po 'jug go /de yang 'di snyam du bdag gis tshogs thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di sems can thams cad la bsgrub par bya'o snyam sems te de snying rje chen po
241b2(mdo 'grel): des bskul nas/ lhag pa'i tshul khrims dang lhag pa'i sems dang lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya'o/ /zhes 'byung ngo
241b3(mdo 'grel): yang de nyid las bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las gang ci la lags pa dang ngag gi las gang ci lags pa dang/ yid kyi las gang ci lags pa de thams cad ni sems can thams cad la lta bas
241b4(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa lags so/ /snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba lags so/ /snying rje chen po'i dbang du gyur pa lags so/ /sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bgyi ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa las byung ba lags so/ /de ltar sman par bgyi ba'i
241b5(mdo 'grel): bsam pa dang ldan pa de ni 'di snyam du 'du shes bgyid de/ sems can thams cad la phan pa sgrub pa dang bde ba sgrub pa gang yin pa de bdag gis bsgrub par bya'o snyam legs so/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de lta bu'i dbang byas nas 'phags pa sdong
241b6(mdo 'grel): po bkod pa'i mdo las byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dpal gyi byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams ji ltar na kha na ma tho ba med pa'i lus kyi las dang ldan pa
241b7(mdo 'grel): yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pa yin/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i yid kyi las dang ldan pa yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher dris nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' ye shes
242a1(mdo 'grel): dpal la 'di skad ces smras so/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras khyod de ltar skye ba mang po la phan pa dang skyo bo mang po la bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba dang bde ba
242a2(mdo 'grel): rnam par gzung ba'i spyod pa'i phyir zhugs shing de ltar khyod rnam pa 'di lta bu'i gnas dag yongs su dri bar sems pa ni kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' dag gi sems kyi las
242a3(mdo 'grel): yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams yon tan khyad par 'di dag thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ba dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i las su 'gyur ba dang sangs
242a4(mdo 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa dang ma byin pa dang da ltar byung ba rnams kyi lam du 'jug pa dang sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems kyang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang chos thams cad ji lta ba
242a5(mdo 'grel): bzhin du rnam par lta ba yang de dag la nye bar gnas pa dang mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs par 'gyur ba dang dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang kun tu mdzes pa dang rnam pa'i mchog thams cad
242a6(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa dang chos thams cad la dbang sgyur zhing srog chags thams cad la ston pa gnyis par 'gyur ba'i sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba yod de kye rgyal ba'i sras dag byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi las
242a7(mdo 'grel): yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba gang dang ldan nas yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag thams cad la 'thob par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi las yid la byed pa'i sbyor ba de dag gang zhe na kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di la byang
242b1(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' i khyim gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin shes pa dang ldan pas khyim gyi thigs pas zil ma non bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /pha ma dang 'grogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 
242b2(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir sangs rgyas dang 'grogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ bu dang bu mo dang 'grogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad sred pa dang shin tu bral bas dga' ba dang
242b3(mdo 'grel): mi dga' ba dang rnam bar bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ 'dod pa'i yon tan dang 'grogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'dod pa bsal cing rnam par sel bar
242b4(mdo 'grel): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /glu dang gar dang rol mo dang sil snyan dang 'grogs pa'i rmo byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad gar mkhan gyi mtshon lta bur mthong ba dang ldan zhing chos yang dag par 'gro ba'i brjod
242b5(mdo 'grel): pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /chung ma'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i gsal shing dang bral zhing 'phags pa'i sar chud par gyur cig ces sems
242b6(mdo 'grel): bskyed do/ /rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad sred par 'byung ba 'jig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas khur bor bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /khang stong du phyin pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems
242b7(mdo 'grel): can thams cad chos kyi khyad par khong du chud cing chos kyi khang steng du phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /sbyin pa gtong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bdag gir bya ba med yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems med
243a1(mdo 'grel): cing bdag gi ba thams cad yongs su gtong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mthal? zheng 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar phyin te/ 'du ba
243a2(mdo 'grel): dang shin tu bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /btson ra la kha na ma tho ba thob na mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas med pa la spyod cing gang du dga' bar de dong bar gyur cig ces sems
243a3(mdo 'grel): bskyed do/ /khyim nas khyim med par 'byung ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sems bcings pa dang grol ba med cing chags pa med mi dgos pa dang bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ dge 'dun
243a4(mdo 'grel): gyi ra de'i mtshams 'da' ba' i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gal ba med pa'i chos dang ldan zhing/ mthun par 'gro ba mang po dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi
243a5(mdo 'grel): byang du 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la rtsom zhing cho ga la mkhas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rab tu 'byung bar gsol ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
243a6(mdo 'grel): cad bar chag med cing phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /gos dkar po'i dor ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sdig pa la brtson pa spangs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu spyad
243a7(mdo 'grel): par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ skra dang kha spu 'deg pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing nyon mongs pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /gos ngur smrig gyon?
243b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad drang srong chen po'i sems dang ldan zhing rnyog pa med par gyur ces sems bskyed do/ /rab tu 'byung ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas skye bo thams cad yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
243b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i rab tu 'byung bas rab tu byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dag pa la mos pa mngon par skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi gdung ma'i chad pa'i don du brtson
243b3(mdo 'grel): bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /chos la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos kyi gter thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
243b4(mdo 'grel): cad chags pa'i gnas dang bral zhing dge 'dun yongs su ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /bslab pa'i tshigs yang dag par len pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad tshul bzang po la yang dag par spyod cing bslab
243b5(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad la shin tu bslab par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /slob dpon gyis bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad log pa ma yin pa'i las la spyod cing tshul dang spyod yul phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems
243b6(mdo 'grel): bskyed do/ /mkhan pos bstan pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas med pa las yang dag par gzhol zhing/ mi skye ba'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i tshe byang chub sems
243b7(mdo 'grel): dpas sems can thams cad tshol thams cad kyi khyad par gyi pha rol tu phyin te/ thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ gtsug lag khang du 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'phrog
244a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i chos can du gyur te/ bla na med pa'i gnas la rnam par spyod par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /stan 'dings pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos ji lta ba bzhin du mthong zhing legs par
244a2(mdo 'grel): bkod pa'i chos can du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /'dug pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi gnas pa'i sems kyis snying po byang chub la 'dug par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /skyil mo krung 'cha'
244a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dmig g.yo ba'i sa la dag ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /zhi gnas yongs su sbyor bar byed pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i
244a4(mdo 'grel): mthar thug pa la brtson zhing zhi ba dang/ dul ba la rab tu gzhol ba 'gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lhag mthong yongs su spyod par byed pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos can du gyur
244a5(mdo 'grel): te chos yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mthong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /skyil mo krung 'jig pa'i tshe byang chub sems pas sems can thams cad shin tu mnyam par bzhag cing 'du byed thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'jig pa rnam
244a6(mdo 'grel): par mthong bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rkang mthil gzhog pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thams cad sems rnam par grol ba mi 'khrugs pa la rab tu gnas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rkang mthil 'degs
244a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan pa thob ste/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor byed pa las thon par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /smad g.yogs gyon pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems
244b1(mdo 'grel): can thams cad ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang ldan zhing dag pa'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /ska rags 'ching ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du
244b2(mdo 'grel): gyur te dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu 'brel par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /bla gos gyon pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob ste/ gong nas gong du dge ba'i rtsa ba thob par
244b3(mdo 'grel): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ sbyor ba gyon pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can du gyur te thabs dam pas mngon par bkab par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /so shing len pa'i byang
244b4(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yongs su dag pa'i dngos po 'thob pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /so shing za ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad nyon mongs
244b5(mdo 'grel): ba shin tu bcom zhing/ sems du la zhing sems dag par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /dben par 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug spangs te/ sdig pa mi dge
244b6(mdo 'grel): ba'i chos thams cad spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ chu dogs su 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la shin tu byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /
244b7(mdo 'grel): gtsang sgra'i las byed pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu dag pa'i dngos pos gtsang zhing nges pa dang ldan par gyur cig sems bskyed do/ /lag pa 'khru ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can
245a1(mdo 'grel): thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bzung zhing bcad pa'i phyir bkra shis kyi lag pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /ngo 'khru ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
245a2(mdo 'grel): shin tu nyon mongs pa dang bral zhing chos thams cad kyi sgo rnam par dag pa thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /khar ba len pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mchod sbyin byas shing lam ston par
245a3(mdo 'grel): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lhung bzed len pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis mchod par 'os shing snod du gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /spyod yul mngon par zhugs pa'i tshe
245a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gnas med pa la yang dag par gzhol zhing sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul mngon du phyogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lam du zhugs pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems
245a5(mdo 'grel): can thams cad phyin ma lus par 'gro zhing sangs rgyas kyi lam du zhugs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos sgrib pa med pa grub
245a6(mdo 'grel): par gyur pas chos kyi dbyings mdza' dang dbus med pa khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lam mthong ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu zhum pa med do khams gsum las
245a7(mdo 'grel): gyen du 'phags par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lam dga' ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu brtan cing sangs rgyas thams cad shin tu 'dus par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/
245b1(mdo 'grel): lam nyam nga ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lta ba yo zhing mi drang ba dang bral te lam nyam nga ba yongs su spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lam drang po mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
245b2(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad g.yo med cing sgyu med de/ sems drang po dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lam rdul chen po mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu rdul med pa'i chos yang dag par thob ste/ 'dod
245b3(mdo 'grel): chags par gyur pa'i chos rnam par 'brel bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rdul med pa'i lam mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying rje chen po yongs su bsgom pa dang ldan zhing sems 'jam par gyur cig
245b4(mdo 'grel): ces sems bskyed do/ /g.yang sa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med par rtogs par khong du chud cing sdig pa'i chos thams cad bsal te/ dge ba'i chos la rab tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces
245b5(mdo 'grel): sems bskyed do/ /'khor ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dus gsum du gtogs pa'i chos zab mo bstan pa dang mthun par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /ka ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
245b6(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad khro zhing khong du 'dzin pa dang bral te/ khengs pa dang 'khrug pa dang rnam par bral bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /nags tshal mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang 'jig rten
245b7(mdo 'grel): du bcas pas phyag bya ba'i gnas su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /ri mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thob par dka' ba dang thib po med par rab tu thob cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi mngon par 'phags
246a1(mdo 'grel): par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /shing tsher ma can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug med cing tsher ma dang bral bar gyur cig ces
246a2(mdo 'grel): sems bskyed do/ /shing lo ma can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dag gis rab tu g.yo bar gyur cig ces sems
246a3(mdo 'grel): bskyed do/ /me tog mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la mngon par shes pa'i me tog rgyas pas me tog lta bur gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /me tog gi shing mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
246a4(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyi me tog shin tu rgyas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /shing tog mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying po byang chub la
246a5(mdo 'grel): gzhol zhing sangs rgyas kyis chos btsal ba thams cad 'bras bu yod 'bras bu dam pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /chu klung mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas
246a6(mdo 'grel): kyi ye shes nyams su myong ste/ chos kyi rgyun la mnyam par bzhag par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lu ma mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir
246a7(mdo 'grel): se gol gtogs pa tsam gyis khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rdzing bu mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad kyi tshig shin tu brtan pa la mkhas shing chos thams cad kyi
246b1(mdo 'grel): rgyas pa'i tshig gi las dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /khron pa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos thams cad 'byor pa dang ldan zhing spobs pa mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mtsho
246b2(mdo 'grel): mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gong nas gong du dmigs pa la rab tu brtson zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba mi zad par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /zam pa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skye bo
246b3(mdo 'grel): thams cad yongs su sgrol ba la zam par red par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /yur ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyi sems dang bsam pa la mkhas shing bag la nyal ba dang kun nas
246b4(mdo 'grel): 'khor ba med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /ra ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gzugs dang sgra dang/ dri dang ro dang reg la sred pa rab tu byang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mya ngan med pa'i nags
246b5(mdo 'grel): tshal mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sred pa bzhin du mya ngan med pa rab tu thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /bza' shing gi ra ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas
246b6(mdo 'grel): kyi byang chub yongs su mi gtong ba la shin tu brtson par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /sems can brgyan gyis brgyan pa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
246b7(mdo 'grel): brgyan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rgyan med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sbyad ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pas rgyan med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ dga' ba mang
247a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la dga' zhing mos pa dang/ spro bas dga' ba mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mi dga' ba mang ba'i sems
247a2(mdo 'grel): can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'dus byas kyi dngos po thams cad la mi dga' ba mang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /sems can bde ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
247a3(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad rab tu thob pas shin tu dben par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /sems can sdug bsngal ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad
247a4(mdo 'grel): ye shes kyi rtsa ba rab tu thob ste/ sdug bsngal zhi bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /nad med pa ma yin pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu mya ngan med pa'i chos can du
247a5(mdo 'grel): gyur te tha dad pa med par khong du chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /sems can sdug bsngal mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
247a6(mdo 'grel): mos pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mi sdug pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bya ba la mos pa chung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed
247a7(mdo 'grel): do/ /drin gzo ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mdzad pa shes par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /drin gzo ba med pa'i

247b2(mdo 'grel): mthar thug par byas la brtson zhing zhib dang dul ba la gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /bram ze mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i dam par te sdig pa spangs par gyur cig ces
247b3(mdo 'grel): sems bskyed do/ /dga' thub pa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar thug pa'i bya ba la brtson zhing dka' thub la shin tu gzhol bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /brtul zhugs pa
247b4(mdo 'grel): mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub yongs su mi gtong ba'i phyir brtul zhugs dam por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /gos gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems
247b5(mdo 'grel): dpas sems can thams cad rang byung ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la go cha bzang po shin tu bgos par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /gos ma gyon pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
247b6(mdo 'grel): cad mi dge ba'i las byas pa thams cad gos gyon pa med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rgol ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad las? kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcod par
247b7(mdo 'grel): gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /'tsho ba'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad spyod lam bcos pa med cing 'tsho ba dag par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rgyal po mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems

248a3(mdo 'grel): spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /blon po mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la bzang po yid la byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /grong khyer
248a4(mdo 'grel): mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad gdul dka' ba'i sems dang ldan par gyur te mthu bo che'i lus 'dra bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rgyal po'i gnas mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
248a5(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad yon tan gyi rjes su 'brang bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /nags tshal gyis 'dab mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bsngags par
248a6(mdo 'grel): 'os par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /grong du 'gro ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos kyi dbyings su chud par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /sgor phyin pa'i tshe byang chub
248a7(mdo 'grel): sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sgor phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /nang du phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid
248b1(mdo 'grel): kyi nang du phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mi sbyin no zhes ma byas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bsod nams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob cing phyir spang ba med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /ma sbyin zhes
248b2(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dmyal ba dang/ byol song gi skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten las phyir spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lhung bzed sdong pa mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
248b3(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis stong par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lhung bzed gang ba mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos dkar po thams cad kyis yongs su rgyas par gyur cig
248b4(mdo 'grel): ces sems bskyed do/ /rim gror byas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi spyod pa thams cad la rim gro byed par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rim gror ma byas pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can
248b5(mdo 'grel): thams cad mi dge ba'i chos spyod pa thams cad la dag ma las par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /khrel yod pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dbang po dben pa'i spyod pa dang ldan zhing khrel yod
248b6(mdo 'grel): par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /ngo tsha med pa'i sems can mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad byams pa la gnas shing ngo tsha med pa yongs su spangs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /kha zas bsod pa thob pa'i
248b7(mdo 'grel): tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad zang zing med pa'i sems dang ldan zhing smon lam thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /kha zas mi bsod pa thob pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
249a1(mdo 'grel): cad ting nge 'dzin nyams su bde ba thams cad thob par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /kha zas snum bag thob pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad snying rje chen po yongs su bsgom pa'i sems dang ldan zhing
249a2(mdo 'grel): sems 'jam par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /snum bag med pa'i zas thob pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'jig rten gyi sred pa dang bral te snum bag med pa'i sems su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /kha zas za ba'i tshe
249a3(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad chos la dga' ba dang rab tu dga' bas yongs su rgyas shing bsam gtan gyi zas za bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /ro myong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad bdud rtsi'i nas?
249a4(mdo 'grel): ngoms par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /zas zos pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi pha rol tu phyin cing bya ba byas par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /chos ston pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
249a5(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing spobs pa mi zad pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /phyir 'byung ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes
249a6(mdo 'grel): nyams su myong ste/ khams gsum nas 'byung bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /chu 'bog pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'bog par gyur cig ces
249a7(mdo 'grel): sems bskyed do/ /khrus byed pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'od mdza' yas pa dang ldan zhing lus dang sems dri ma med par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /dro ba la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams
249b1(mdo 'grel): cad mu med par phyin te yongs su gdung ba bsil bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /bsil ba la spyod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad shin tu bsil bar gyur te bla na med pa'i bsil ba'i dngos po khong du chud par gyur cig
249b2(mdo 'grel): ces sems bskyed do/ /chos thob par byed pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gtam gyi rjes su 'gro zhing chos kyi dbyings dang 'dres par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems

249b4(mdo 'grel): mdzes pas kun tu bzang por gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mchod rten mthong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad 'gro ba kun gyis mchod par 'os shing mchod rten lta bur gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lta ba'i tshe byang chub
249b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis blta bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /spyi 'os 'thug pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis spyi gtsug ltar mi snang
249b6(mdo 'grel): bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byed pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du don dang mthun par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lan gsum du bskor ba'i tshe byang chub sems
249b7(mdo 'grel): dpas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tu mos pa'i rab dang ldan par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi yon tan brjod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas yon tan
250a1(mdo 'grel): mi zad par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /mtshon rnams brjod pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i chos rnams la gzhol zhing yan lag dam pa phun sum tshogs par gyur
250a2(mdo 'grel): cig ces sems bskyed do/ /rkang pa 'khru ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad dri ma med pa'i mthar phyin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas pha rol tu phyin par gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /lus myong ba'i tshe byang chub sems dpas
250a3(mdo 'grel): sems can thams cad bsam pa la rnyog pa med cing lus kyi 'du byed shin tu bde bar gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /gnyid sad pa'i tshe byang chub sems dpas sems can thams cad phyogs bcu thams cad du mthu chen po thob par gyur te/ thams
250a4(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas ba'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces sems bskyed do/ /zhes gsungs so/ /de dag la khams kyi nus pa dang sbyar la ci nus kyis slob ste/ khams bde bzhin du nyes par bsam pa sems/ nyes par
250a5(mdo 'grel): smra brjod/ nyes par bya ba'i las byed cing tha mal pa'i spyod pas dus 'da' bar byed pas yang spang bar bya'o/ /langs pa'i spyod pa bshad zin to/ /de la khams kyi chod bzung ba gang zhe na/ bsam pa'i shes rab skyes pa'i rjes la khams mi bde ba'i mtshan
250a6(mdo 'grel): ma cung zad na nyin gcig gam mtshan gcig gam/ zhag gnyis kyi bar du bsam pa'i shes rab ji ltar skyes pa de tsam skabs skabs su dran par bya ba ma gtogs pa bya ba gzhan yang mi bya/ bsgom yang mi bsgom par khams rtas su gzhug go /
250a7(mdo 'grel): de nas khams rtes nga 'am/ khams mi bde ba ma byung yang bsam pa'i shes rab kyi rjes la mnyam par bzhag pas gnas su mang 'dod pa dag gis 'di ltar mtshan mo ye mi bsgom par gnyid ci tsam log pa de tsam gyi khams rtas pa de tsam
250b1(mdo 'grel): log cing brnal lo/ /nyi ma dang po snga dro thun gcig phyi dro thun gcig bsgom te/ yun ni gom pa tha mal pas mda' rgyang phyed du phyin ba tsam mo/ /de nas snga dro thun re phyi dro thun re bsnan cing bsgom bas nyi ma lnga pa la thun bcu'o/ /de yang na tshe phrin tshogs ma byung na de bzhin du bsnan
250b2(mdo 'grel): bar bya'i byung na de ma zhi'i bar du bsnan par mi bya'o/ /na tsha ma byung yang de'i phyin chad sems gnas pa ma thob kyi bar du nyin ma? la thun bcu bcu las med bar mi bsgom mo/ /gal te khams tha ma zhig yin nam/ 'bring zhig yang sems gnas pa dka' 
250b3(mdo 'grel): bas zhag bcu tsam lon bas khams nus pa chung ba 'am/ khams rab yin yang sems gnas pa bul ba'i rigs nas zhag nyi shu tsam lon pas nus pa chung ba 'am/ na tsha phran chags byung na mos dang mthun pa'i kha zas sam/ btung ba 'am sku
250b4(mdo 'grel): mnyel sogs pas zhi bar bya ste sran skyed cing mi sgom mo/ /yang phal cher thun zhab la zhan pa 'am/ dgongs ka zhan na phyi de nyin bar nas thun re re gnyis gnyis 'bri zhing bsgom mo/ /yang khams drag tu sod nas snga ma bzhin du bsgom ste/ de ltar
250b5(mdo 'grel): byas na khams rab 'bring tha ma 'phral la shes te 'ong bas nyi ma re re la nus pa ji tsam yod pa de tsam re bsgom par bya'o/ /de dag ni sems gnas pa ma thob pa'i bar gyi khams kyi tshod gzung ba yin no/ /de la bsgom pas sems kyi
250b6(mdo 'grel): skye ba'i rim pa gang zhe na/ mdor bsdu na gsum ste/ shin tu myur bar bsal ba'i shes rab kyi rjes thogs kho nar skye ba dang/ ha cang yun ring po ma lon par skye ba dang/ yun ring du lon nas skye ba'o/ /de la shin tu myur pa la gnyis te kha cig ni  bsam pa'i shes rab skye ba'i skabs der chos thams cad ji ltar rtogs pa dang/ de la blo ji ltar bzhag na mi 'gal bar dran par byed pa mtshams sbyor ba'i shes pa cung zhig bskyed ma thag kho nar rab tu bsgrims nas ci la yang
251a1(mdo 'grel): mi gnas par bzhag pas lhan gyis gnas te/ de nyid du lus yod par mi tshor bar chab rom zhu ba lta bur song nas nam ma langs pa'i snod bstan pa'i nang na chu gtsang ma yod pa bzhin du ha cang mi gsal te/ mi
251a2(mdo 'grel): g.yo bar ni gnas pa yin no/ /de lta bu byung na des yun goms pa tha mal pas mda' rgyang gsum lhag tsam du phyin pa'i bar du bsgoms la/ de nas bde ba de 'phro bcad nas ldang ste/ thun de la bcos kyang mi dgos so/ /de nas zhag mang rab tu
251a3(mdo 'grel): yang lus dben pa dang sems ma bslang nus pa ma zad na ma bcos kyang gong ma bzhin du gnas nus so/ /tshogs mi ldan nam nus pa chung bas gzhan du song na sngar bstan pa bzhin du ci rigs par spyos so/ /kha cig la gong ma
251a4(mdo 'grel): bzhin du bzhag pas de ma thag tu lhan gyis gnas shing mi g.yo bar 'dug kyang lus yod par mi tshor ba mi 'byung ste/ ming dang ming can du 'brel ba'i rtog pa med pa tsam mo/ /de lta bu byung na ni yun gom pa tha mal pas mda' rgyang
251a5(mdo 'grel): gcig tu phyin tsam du bsgoms nas ldang ngo/ /thun de phyin tshad kyang de las ring par mi bsgom zhing/ langs pa'i gnas skabs su bka' dang bstan bcos don dam pa ston pa kho na skabs skabs su lta ba dang dran par bya'o/ /de nas skyed
251a6(mdo 'grel): byung nas lus yod par mi tshor ba'i nyams shig byung na de'i skabs su yun goms pa tha mal pas mda' rgyang gsum du phyin pa tsam du bsgoms nas bde ba de 'phro bcad la ldang ngo/ /bcos pa'i dus dang/ ji ltar bcos pa ni gong
251a7(mdo 'grel): ma bzhin du bya ste/ de ni shin tu myur ba'i skye lugs gnyis so/ /de ha cang yun ring po ma yin par skye ba la gnyis te/ kha cig ni gong du bstan pa bzhin du sems bzhag pa ni skye ba'i rim pa bzhi byung ste/ shes pa 'phro zhing 'dug
251b1(mdo 'grel): tu mi 'dod la yang bsgribs shing bzhag kyang za zi dang lhang lhong dang/ rtsub pa dang/ gyong ba dang/ yud tsam yang sdod du mi 'dod pa'i nyams 'byung ste/ de lta bu byung na yun goms pa tha mal bas mda' rgyang phyed du phyin pa tsam du bsgoms nas
251b2(mdo 'grel): 'phro bcad de bzhag kha cig du nyams de las mi skye ba dang/ de nas zhag mang rab lon nas bskyed byung ste/ bsgribs pa'i stobs kyi shes pa 'phro ba nyung ba za zi nyung bar gnas kyang rtsub po dang gyong ba dang 'dzin pa med pa'i nyams dang de
251b3(mdo 'grel): nas cung skyed byung ste/ sems phyi rol du mi 'phro zhing za zi dang rtsub pa dang snyam byed pa yang zhi ste/ dbugs mi bde zhing shes pa gyong se 'dug la/ skabs skabs su thun stong thun smad la bag tsam 'jam par tshor ba'i nyams shig 'byung ngo//
251b4(mdo 'grel): de nas zhag mang po ma thogs par bskyed 'byung nas bsgom pa'i tshe thun stong ngam/ bar ram smad dam/ mi sgom pa'i skabs gcig tu blo bur du dran pa'i thog la lhan lhan je ba de je ba de la dper na rlung tshub kyi nang na 'dug pa'i 'phro la khyim
251b5(mdo 'grel): dron po'i nang du phyin pa snyam byed la 'jam zhing bstan bar gnas te/ nam mkha' ha cang mi dkar ba'i nang na 'dug pa bzhin du ha cang mi gsol la lus yod par mi tshor ba yin no/ /de lta bu byung na yun gom pa tha mal pas mda' rgyang
251b6(mdo 'grel): gsum lhag tsam du phyin par bsgoms nas bde ba de 'phro bcad la ldang ngo/ /bcos dgos pa'i dus dang/ bcos pa'i thabs ni sngar smos pa bzhin du bya'o/ /yang kha cig la 'di ltar 'byung ste/ sngar smos pa bzhin du sems
251b7(mdo 'grel): bzhag pas rtog pa rags pa mi 'byung zhing za zi nyung yang gnas pa'i mtshan nyid med do/ /bsgribs pa'i stobs kyi mi 'phro ba tsam du 'dug pa'i nyams shig byung na yun goms pa tha mal pas mda' rgyang byed du phyin pa tsam zhig
252a1(mdo 'grel): bsgoms la ldang ngo/ /de ltar yun de tsam du bsgoms pas skyed byung nas sgrim pa'i rta bos so thun stong thun smad 'jam pa 'am/ 'dzin pa'i zhang bag re 'ong/ res 'ga' thun rangs pa la snga ma bzhin du
252a2(mdo 'grel): 'dug pa 'byung ba dang/ de skyed byung bas bsgrims pa'i stobs kyi thun zhabs su phyin gyi bar du mi 'phro la bags kyis rnam par gnas kyang glong na de tsam yang med pa'i nyams kyi ba dang/ de nas skyed byung ste bsgrims na snyi mul gyi
252a3(mdo 'grel): 'gro bar 'dug pas bsgrim mi dgos so/ /gtang na gtang dka' bas glong la bzhag pas chog ste/ shin tu gdang pa ni ma yin pas yang lus yod par mi tshor bar 'byung na yul gom pa tha mal pas mda' rgyang gsum lhag tsam du phyin
252a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i bar bsgoms bde bar 'phro bcad la ldang ngo/ /bcas dgos pa'i dus dang ji ltar bcos pa ni sngar smos pa bzhin du bya'o/ /de gnyis ni ha cang yun ring po ma yin par gnas pa yin no/ /ring po lon nas skye ba'i gcig ste/ kha cig
252a5(mdo 'grel): la sngar smos pa bzhin du sems bzhag pas sna tshogs su 'phro zhen 'dug tu mi 'dod de shes pa bsgrims na slar mi bde ste/ de bas slong na bde ba 'dra ba zhig 'byung ste/ de yun goms tha mal pas mda' rgyang phyed du phyin tsam zhig bsgom
252a6(mdo 'grel): nas ldang ngo/ /de ni shin tu gnas par dka' ba yin pas mi bde yang bsgrims shing bzhag pas yun ring po lon nas skyed byung ste/ thun phal cher bsgrims kyang mi bde ba med la 'phro ba nyung zhing tshor ba yang sla dgag pa yang sla ba'i
252a7(mdo 'grel): nyams shig 'byung ba dang/ de goms pas yun ring du lon pa dang/ bsgrims na 'jam zhing mi 'phro la glong na cag cag tsam 'phro ba 'byung ba'i nyams dang/ de nas ring po mi thogs par bsgom pa'i 'phro 'am/ nga la gso ba 'am
252b1(mdo 'grel): srod la mal du zhugs pa'i tshe 'am/ dus la nges pa med do/ /ltem gyis gnas de bsgribs yang mi nus/ glong ba par yang dka' sbyin zhang du byas nas lus yod par mi tshor zhing ha cang mi gdang ba'i nyams shig 'byung ste/ des yun goms pa
252b2(mdo 'grel): tha mal pas me/ mda' rgyang gsum du phyin pa tsam du bsgoms nas bde ba de 'phro bcad la ldang ngo/ /bcos dgos pa'i dus du/ ji ltar bcos pa ni sngar smos pa bzhin du bya ste/ skye ba'i rim par bshad zin to/ /de la gnas pa'i tshad gang
252b3(mdo 'grel): zhe na/ de ni rgyu'i stobs kyis rab 'bring mdza' gsum du dbye ste/ de la rab ni shes bsgribs rung mi bsgribs rung rtog pa'i don las mi g.yas zhing dbugs bags kyis 'gul ba tsam yang tshor bar dka' ba dang/ lus la rags pa
252b4(mdo 'grel): dang phra ba'i 'du shes mi skye ba dang/ shin tu sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam par bzhag pa dang mthun pa'i rlung dzin pas khyim gyi nang na 'dug bsnyam byed cing 'jam pa dang yang bshes che ba dang/ bying ba dang/ rgod pa dang/ lung du ma bstan
252b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i sems dang/ lhag mthong chungs pa dang/ zhi gnas chungs pa med kyang yun ring du goms par ma byas pas mun pa ha cang gnag pa ma yin pa'i tshul du 'dug pa dang/ mtshan nyid de lta bus myur du gnas pa 'am/ phyin gnas kyang
252b6(mdo 'grel): rung nus pa chung ba dang/ bcos pa'i skabs ma rtogs pa/ dang po 'jug ka'i sems des yun gom pa tha mal bas mda' rgyang gsum lhag tsam du phyin pa'i bar du shugs kyis gnas nus pa'o/ /de la 'bring ni dbug la bltas na bags
252b7(mdo 'grel): kyis 'gul ba tshor bar sla ba dang/ lus la ji ltar gnas pa mi shes pa tsam dang/ shin tu sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid ting nge 'dzin dang mthun pa'i lus kyi rlung zin pas spri dkar mi 'gul ba'i nang na 'dug pa snyam byed cing 'jam pa dang chad
253a1(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ 'bring dang/ yun gom pa tha mal pas mda' rgyang gnyis su phyin pa tsam du gnas nus pa ste/ gzhan ni snga ma bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de la tha ma ni lus la ji ltar gnas bltas na shes te 'ong ba dang/ 'jam
253a2(mdo 'grel): pa dang yang ba cung zad yod pa dang/ shin tu sbyang ba'i mtshan nyid ting nge 'dzin dang mthun pa'i rung zin pa ni bla gab med pa na sgom yang logs tsam skyor ba'am bla gab tsam yod pa'i nang du phyin pa snyam byed pa dang/ dbugs sna dang kha'i
253a3(mdo 'grel): sgo nas 'byung ba mi tshor te khong na phyed du ma gtad kyang shin tu dal ba dang 'jam pa dang phra rab tshor ba dang yun gom pa tha mal pas mda' rgyang ba cig tu phyin pa tsam du gnas nus pa'o/ /gzhan ni gong ma bzhin no/ /gnas pa'i tshad
253a4(mdo 'grel): bstan zin to/ //de la bstan pa'i thabs ci rigs par bya ba gang zhe na/ khams kyi tshod las dpags te/ sems gnas pa rab dang 'bring dang tha ma gsum gang byung yang mtshan nyid shes par bya/ re zhig de tsam
253a5(mdo 'grel): gyi chog shes par bya/ ha cang gzengs mtho bar mi bya/ khams kyi nus par rang shugs dang sbyar la bsgom mo/ /de la mtshan nyid ma shes na sems gnas pa de tshor ro/ /de yang gang zhe na/ gnas pa rab chad cig byung yang kha cig lnga
253a6(mdo 'grel): na de 'dra ba nyams su myong bas skrag na 'phro gcod pa dang/ sngar mi gnas pa gnas par byed pa'i skabs su nyin mtshan gnyis ka bsgoms na khams 'khrugs te 'ong bas mtshan mo ma bsgoms shig ces smras pas de sems la
253a7(mdo 'grel): bzhag nas gal te mtshan mo gnas pa byung na bsgom rgyu ma yin snyam nas 'phro bcad pa dang/ yang sngar bsgrims shing gtad pas skabs der bsgrims mi dgos bzhin lhag par bsgrims nas de nyams su ma blangs pa dang/ 'bring
253b1(mdo 'grel): dang tha ma byung na grogs po gzhan la rab byung ba thos pas rgyu'i bye brag la me ci bar thams cad tshad gcig pas 'di med snyam nas lhag par bcol ba byas ba dang/ gzhan gsum ni snga ma bzhin no/ /de bas na gnas pa'i tshad sngar bstan
253b2(mdo 'grel): pa bzhin du shes par bya'o/ /de la chog mi shes pa'i nyos pa ni kha cig sems gnas pa'i mtshan nyid shes kyang mang du thos pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'bring dang tha ma byung na lta ha cang ches/ rab cig byung yang gzhan bas lhag pa cig bya snyam nas
253b3(mdo 'grel): brtsal drags pas tshor ba yin te/ de bas na rab byung na ha cang ches/ 'bring dang tha ma byung yang re zhig bstan par bya'o/ /de la ha cang gzengs? ma thos na nyes pa ci yod ce na/ kha cig 'bring dang tha ma tsam du byung na yang g.yengs nas chod mi
253b4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin par bsgoms pa dang/ rab byung na lta ha cang ches/ 'di tsam gzhan la med snyams nas mtshan rangs bsgom zhing gnyid spong ba dang/ nang bar chos ston mi za bar bsgom pa dang/ de la de ni tsha mi 'od zer nas tshod mi 'dzin par bsgom
253b5(mdo 'grel): ste/ de ci khams cher 'khrugs te 'gro ba dang/ dmigs pa 'char bar yin no/ /de bas na sems gnas par shes nas skyon de dag spangs la sngar bsgom pa las thun gyi grangs nyung bar bya ste/ srod dang tho rangs la thun re/ nyin par
253b6(mdo 'grel): thun res gnyis/ ris thun gsum ste/ nyin mtshan gnyis la thun lnga las mang bar mi bsgom mo/ /de tsam mi nus na nyin gcig dang mtshan gcig la nus pa che chung gis nyin par thun/ nyis mtshan mo gnyis te bzhi 'am/ nyin par gnyis
253b7(mdo 'grel): pa srod la gcig ste gsum mo/ /sngar ji tsam gsal ba de las rtsol ba mi bya bar bsgom mo/ /yun ni gom pa tha mal pas mda' rgyang gsum dang gnyis dang gcig tu ci rigs par nus pa che chung gis bsgom ste/ mtshan gcig dang/ nyin
254a1(mdo 'grel): gcig dang/ zhag gcig dang/ zhag gnyis dang/ zhag gsum dang/ bzhi dang/ lnga dang/ bcu dang/ bco lnga dang/ nyi shu 'am/ mdor na la gor nus pa ci zad dang/ khams ci 'khrugs byed pa ma yin
254a2(mdo 'grel): te/ ji srid du rang zhugs kyis lus ngal ba dang/ sems du ba za 'am/ bsgom tsam na sdang pa 'am/ shugs 'byung ba 'am/ mgo bags kyis lci ba'am/ yam yam byed pa 'am/ lus 'dar ba'am/ nub mo gnyid srab pa'am/ zas mi
254a3(mdo 'grel): zhim pa 'am/ ngag gi 'khrul pa mang du byung ba'am/ sems song snga bar 'dug pa la sogs pa khams mi bde ba'i mtshan ma cung zad ma byung gi bar du bsgom mo/ /de nas byung nas ngal gso te/ lus la bsku mnye bya/ chos dang mthun
254a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i zas skom gyis lus kyi nus pa rtas su gzhug go /khams sor ma chud kyi bar du nyin mtshan gnyis la nam bsgom snying ma 'dod pa'i dus su thun mi ring bar blta ba tsam bsgom mo/ /nus pa rtas nas srod tho rangs thun ring ba re
254a5(mdo 'grel): nyin par lnga dro gcig phyi red gcig dang thun bzhi nyin mtshan phrugs gcig la bsgom ste/ bsod nams kyi tshogs dang lus kyi bces thabs dang/ snying rje sngon du 'gro ba dang/ smon lam la sogs pa gong du smos pa bzhin bya'o/ /de
254a6(mdo 'grel): la gsal ba'i bskyed 'byung ba gang zhe na/ sngar bstan pa'i thabs kyi bstan par byas nas gong ma bzhin du sgom pa des/ dang por dmigs pa 'bring dang tha ma las ma zin pa zhig yin na bar chad ma byung yang gsal ba'i skyed dbyung
254a7(mdo 'grel): dgos so/ /de nas zla 'di zla ba kha cig rgyang de tsam ha cang mi dag par bsgom mo/ /chos dang mi 'gal ba'i bya ba phran tshegs kyang bya/ de nyin par bskab med na yang srod dang tho rangs la sngon du 'gro ba dang smon lam dang bcas pa yun e
254b1(mdo 'grel): mi ring ba thun re bsgom mo/ /de nas dang po'i slob lugs bzhin du zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi tshogs mdza' dag la ci nus kyis bsten cing yo byad sbyin bdag la gsol gdab byas la/ gnas dben zhing nyams dga' ba la sogs pa gnas
254b2(mdo 'grel): kyi yon tan ci mang der grogs tshul khrims dag cing lta ba mthun pa 'ga' tsam dang lhan cig tu dam bcas la gnas so/ /de skad du/ 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po las/ nor bu rin chen 'dra bar tshul khrims bsrungs/ rjes su
254b3(mdo 'grel): mthun pa'i grogs la rtag par brten zhes gsungs so/ /yang de nyid las/ ting nge 'dzin rgyal po stong pa 'di sgom pa/ /tshul khrims dag pa'i mgo la 'di 'dug ste/ /chos rnams rang bzhin rtag tu mnyam bzhag na/ /byis pas mi rigs
254b4(mdo 'grel): btson pas mi shes zhes gsungs so/ /de re zhig chos dang mthun pa'i bya ba yang spangs pa yin na mi mthun pa lta ci smos/ de bas na khyim kun 'bar ba'i nang na 'dug pa chu bsil ba 'dod pa lta ba'i sems kyi thams cad btang la de kho na
254b5(mdo 'grel): nyid la mos par bya'o/ /de skad du/ mdo de nyid las/ mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba lta bu'i sems kyis pha dang ma dang bu dang bu mo dang nye du dang/ snag gi gnyen mtshams dang/ chung ma la sogs pa me bzhin du spangs la rgyal srid kyi bde ba
254b6(mdo 'grel): yang mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du spangs nas rab tu byung la dgon par gnas par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzhon nu de lta bu des ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang rnyed par dka' ba ma yin na ting nge 'dzin 'di lta ci
254b7(mdo 'grel): smos so zhes gsungs so/ /de la rtag tu bya ba'i sman kha zas dang btung ba chos dang mi 'gal zhing/ na ba'i gsos sman dang/ dros tshad kyi gos dang sngon la sogs pas khams brtags par bya'o/ /zhag bcu 'am/ zla ba phyed dam/ nam bde
255a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i tshad du phyin gyi bar du sos ngal zhing/ khams gso ste/ mtshan ma mi bsgom/ nyin par thun thung ngu re re tsam las mi bsgom par nus pa rtas su gzhug go /dang po rab tshad du zin pa yin yang glo bur
255a2(mdo 'grel): gyi nad la sogs pa bar chad kyis nyams yang dmigs pa 'bring dang zhes bya ba nas thun re bsgom mo/ zhes bya ba'i bar ma gtogs pa gong ma bzhin du byas la nus pa rtas su gzhug go /de nas nyin re la thun thung ngu ra bsgom pa
255a3(mdo 'grel): de yang gzhag la/ bsam pa'i shes rab kyis nyin par snga dro gcig phyi dro gcig /mtshan mo srod la gcig dang thun gsum du bsams te/ yun nges pa skyes kyi bar du'o/ /'di snyam du sems kyi chog nyid rtogs na/ chos thams
255a4(mdo 'grel): cad kyi chos nyid rtogs pa yin par theg pa chen po'i bka' sde snod dang bstan bcos las gsungs pas bdag gi rang gi sems la so sor brtag par bya'o snyam du bsam mo/ /yang 'di snyam du gang rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa
255a5(mdo 'grel): ni nges par mi rtag ste/ dper na mar me'i rtse mo lta bu'o/ /bdag gi sems 'di yang 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang/ gnod sems dang/ mi dga' ba dang/ rmugs pa dang/ gnyid dang/ rgod pa dang/ 'gyod pa dang/ the tshom dang/ mi rtsol ba
255a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ rtsol ba la sogs pas dbang byas shing rag las nas skye bas na mi rtag ste/ de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang/ kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag ces gsungs so/ /gang skyes nas 'gags pa de ni skad cig ma'i
255a7(mdo 'grel): cha shas yod de/ dper na tshor ba sdug bsngal lta bu'o/ /bdag gi sems da ltar byung ba 'di yang skyes la dgag pa yin pas cha shas dang bcas pa'o/ /gang cha shas dang bcas pa de ni nges par gcig tu mi 'grub ste/ dper
